# Welcome to Slidle!
If you don't see navigation controls below, move your mouse or
touch your screen, as the case may be. Or use the arrow keys
on your keyboard, if you have one.
## Formatting
You can use Markdown to format text. It will render adjacent
non-empty lines as paragraphs, for example.
### Section headings ...
... at various levels are marked by 1-6 hashes.
A bunch of lines starting with dashes will be shown as a list:
- Text between asterisks will be rendered with *emphasis*.
- Text between double asterisks will be made **strong**.
Using square and round brackets you can make links, like
[this](http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax).
1. What about ordered lists? Those are also supported!
2. Just add a number and a period at the start of the lines.
- And nested lists?
- But of course, just indent those lines!
## Samuel L. Ipsum
An exceedingly long text, to check that scrolling works when
needed. Courtesy of the [slipsum](http://slipsum.com/lite/)
generator (I used the polite version).
### Righteous Man
The path of the righteous man is beset on all sides by the
iniquities of the selfish and the tyranny of evil men. Blessed
is he who, in the name of charity and good will, shepherds the
weak through the valley of darkness, for he is truly his
brother's keeper and the finder of lost children. And I will
strike down upon thee with great vengeance and furious anger
those who would attempt to poison and destroy My brothers. And
you will know My name is the Lord when I lay My vengeance upon
thee.
### Time Travel
You see? It's curious. Ted did figure it out - time travel.
And when we get back, we gonna tell everyone. How it's
possible, how it's done, what the dangers are. But then why
fifty years in the future when the spacecraft encounters a
black hole does the computer call it an "unknown entry
event"? Why don't they know? If they don't know, that means
we never told anyone. And if we never told anyone it means we
never made it back. Hence we die down here. Just as a matter
of deductive logic.
### Taste for murder
You think water moves fast?
You should see ice. It moves like it has a mind. Like it knows
it killed the world once and got a taste for murder. After the
avalanche it took us a week to climb out. Now, I don't know
exactly when we turned on each other, but I know that seven of
us survived the slide... and only five made it out. Now we
took an oath, that I'm breaking now. We said we'd say it was
the snow that killed the other two, but it wasn't. Nature is
lethal but it doesn't hold a candle to man.
### Toy Store
Do you see any Teletubbies in here? Do you see a slender
plastic tag clipped to my shirt with my name printed on it?
Do you see a little Asian child with a blank expression on his
face sitting outside on a mechanical helicopter that shakes
when you put quarters in it? No? Well, that's what you see at
a toy store. And you must think you're in a toy store, because
you're here shopping for an infant named Jeb.
### Pilot
Well, the way they make shows is, they make one show. That
show's called a pilot. Then they show that show to the people
who make shows, and on the strength of that one show they
decide if they're going to make more shows. Some pilots get
picked and become television programs. Some don't, become
nothing. She starred in one of the ones that became nothing.
### Mr Glass
Now that we know who you are, I know who I am. I'm not a
mistake! It all makes sense! In a comic, you know how you can
tell who the arch-villain's going to be? He's the exact
opposite of the hero. And most times they're friends, like you
and me! I should've known way back when... You know why, David?
Because of the kids. They called me Mr Glass.
### Pit Bull
Yeah, I like animals better than people sometimes...
Especially dogs. Dogs are the best. Every time you come home,
they act like they haven't seen you in a year. And the good
thing about dogs... is they got different dogs for different
people. Like pit bulls. The dog of dogs. Pit bull can be the
right man's best friend... or the wrong man's worst enemy. You
going to give me a dog for a pet, give me a pit bull. Give
me... Raoul. Right, Omar? Give me Raoul.
### Chaos Rules
Like you, I used to think the world was this great place where
everybody lived by the same standards I did, then some kid with
a nail showed me I was living in his world, a world where chaos
rules not order, a world where righteousness is not rewarded.
That's Cesar's world, and if you're not willing to play by his
rules, then you're gonna have to pay the price.
### Lysine
The lysine contingency - it's intended to prevent the spread
of the animals in case they ever got off the island. Dr. Wu
inserted a gene that makes a single faulty enzyme in protein
metabolism. The animals can't manufacture the amino acid
lysine. Unless they're continually supplied with lysine by us,
they'll slip into a coma and die.
